com.whirvis.jraknet.example.chat.client

Class ChatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whirvis.jraknet.example.chat.client.ChatClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RakNetClientListener

    public class ChatClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements RakNetClientListener
    A simple chat client built using JRakNet and a JFrame.
    Author:
    Whirvis T. Wheatley

                            int channel)
                     throws InvalidChannelException
        Sends a chat message to the channel.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send.
        channel - the channel to send it to.
        Throws:
        InvalidChannelException - if the channel exceeds the limit.

      • setUsernameRequest

        public void setUsernameRequest(java.lang.String newUsername)
                        throws ChatException
        Requests to change the username mid-session.
        Parameters:
        newUsername - the new username.
        Throws:
        ChatException - if an error occurs during the request.

      • setChannel

        public void setChannel(int channel)
                throws InvalidChannelException,
                       ChatException
        Sets the current displayed channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - the new channel to display.
        Throws:
        InvalidChannelException - if the channel exceeds the limit.
        ChatException - if an error occurs when setting the channel.
